title: Advanced Phone And Smartwatch System
description: Elevate your Unreal Engine projects with the Advanced Smartwatch and Phone System, a fully interactive and customizable solution designed for seamless integration into your games or simulations.
longDescription:
Introducing the Smartwatch and Phone Advanced System for Unreal Engine, a powerhouse of functionality and versatility. This asset includes advanced time tracking with AM/PM and Month/Day support settings. Experience precise calorie calculations tailored to your weight, age, heart rate, and activity choice. The comprehensive app displayer features activity, weather, sleep, music, flashlight, and sport apps.


[VIDEO PREVIEW]


[DOCUMENTATION]


Phone System manages essential functionalities like battery level, signal strength (location-based), photo and wallpaper management, as well as settings such as 12/24-hour modes, battery saving, and muting for stealth scenarios. Players can capture photos with the Camera App, view them in the Gallery, and customize their phone's appearance.


The Communication App supports group chats with customizable dialogues, including options for sender info, attachments, and player decisions, making it ideal for narrative-driven games. The Minimap App helps with navigation, while the Settings App provides control over phone behavior, adding convenience during gameplay.


The News App offers dynamic updates based on in-game triggers, allowing players to follow game world events. The Contact App enables dynamic contact management, while the Music Player App allows for in-game music playback and ringtone customization. Lastly, the Smart Home App extends control over external devices like an in-game vacuum, adding a layer of simulation to the experience.


Smartwatch System comes with example heart rate presets such as idle, running, football, American football, basketball, volleyball, boxing, cycling, indoor cycling, ice hockey, roller skating, tennis, table tennis, weightlifting, chess.


Optimized for performance, the code eliminates casting and ticking. The step counter integrates seamlessly with animations, providing real-time updates. Utilize the flashlight application to display it on controlled pawns with selected intensity. Versatile dynamic stamina system and its regeneration and adjusted heart rate and burnt calories with a clamped range. Stay informed with the robust notification system and implement them by using provided examples. 


Manage battery life efficiently, and utilize example triggers for easy incorporation of each functionality into your project. Elevate your game with this exceptional Smartwatch Asset.


This system provides a versatile, interactive framework that can be tailored to different game genres and player interactions in Unreal Engine projects.
technicalDetails:
Features:


Smartwatch

  • Advanced Calories calculation that is based on our weight, age, heart rate and chosen activity
  • Advanced app displayer that include: activity, weather, sleep, music, flashlight, sport apps
  • Performance wise written code without casting, ticking
  • Versatile step counter driven by animation notifies
  • Flashlight application that allows you to send a message to controlled pawn
  • Notification system 
  • Battery management system


Phone

  • Communication App: Create group chats and dialogues with dynamic elements like sender info, avatars, attachments , and Player decision-making integrated into chat responses.
  • Minimap App: Displays real-world location and rotation, ideal for quest systems.
  • Camera App: Capture photos with left-click, exit mode with middle-click, and view photos in the Gallery App.
  • Gallery App: View and enlarge photos captured via the Camera App.
  • News App: Dynamic news based on in-game triggers and internet browsing functionality.
  • Contact App: Add and update contacts dynamically
  • Music Player App: Play music and set ringtones.
  • Smart Home App: Control external devices, with vacuum cleaner example


Number of Blueprints: 54

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
